original_text: And stooping to look in, he saw the linen cloths lying there, but he did not go in.
korean_text: 구부려 세마포 놓인 것을 보았으나 들어가지는 아니하였더니

sentences.original_text: he saw the linen cloths lying there
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그곳에 놓인 세마포 옷가지들을 보았습니다

sentences.original_text: but he did not go in
